title: Comparing Jordan Peterson and John Walton on Precosmic Chaos
description:
Commentary on the Jordan Peterson Biblical Series 2b2. 

This is a sub-series on JBP, Gen 1 and Chaos
Video 1 in this series was how JBP has impacted my reading of the Bible. https://youtu.be/CVfzXgBvu90 

John Walton on Veritas Forum https://youtu.be/6RDAbu0KDwM 
JBP Bib Ser 2 https://youtu.be/hdrLQ7DpiWs 

John Walton Books https://www.amazon.com/Lost-World-Genesis-One-Cosmology/dp/0830837043 

https://www.amazon.com/Genesis-1-as-Ancient-Cosmology/dp/1575063840/ 

https://www.amazon.com/Zondervan-Illustrated-Bible-Backgrounds-Commentary/dp/0310255724

The Bible software I use: https://www.logos.com/ 

Link to the site with Calvin on the moon and Saturn. https://postbarthian.com/2014/01/27/calvin-on-genesis-1-as-an-accommodation-to-the-ordinary-custom-of-men/
